changeSet.author: Leap (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE dbs_dashboard_configuration SET apply_theme =b'1' WHERE id = '94055'; UPDATE dbs_widget_configuration SET apply_theme =b'1' WHERE id IN ('443850','443851','443852','443853','443854','443856');

UPDATE dbs_dashboard_configuration SET apply_theme = 'true' WHERE id = '94055'; UPDATE dbs_widget_configuration SET apply_theme = 'true' WHERE id IN ('443850','443851','443852','443853','443854','443856');

changeSet.author: Leap (generated)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE dbs_dashboard_configuration SET apply_theme = true WHERE id = '94055'; UPDATE dbs_widget_configuration SET apply_theme = true WHERE id IN ('443850','443851','443852','443853','443854','443856');
